Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT value(COUNT(*)0)
FROM SEGUROS.V0HISTSINI
 
WHERE a.num_apolice         =  :NUM_APOLICE
  and a.num_item            =  :NUM_ITEM
  and a.ramo                =  31
  and h.num_Apol_sinistro   =  A.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
  and h.operacao          in  (2011,2012)
  and h.situacao          <>  '2'
/
 END SQL
